sentences.english: He followed up with a visit to Iran the following year and then befriended Chávez.
sentences.chinese: 翌年，他又到访伊朗，之后结识了查韦斯。

sentences.english: Another year of using binoculars while building a savings account will be time you'll never regret.
sentences.chinese: 为了攒钱多使用翌年双筒镜会使你终生难忘。

sentences.english: Ding Yanyong travels to Japan, and he enters the Tokyo Art School the following year.
sentences.chinese: 丁衍庸赴日留学，翌年入东京美术学校。

sentences.english: The next year, they make the same New Year's resolutions.
sentences.chinese: 翌年开春，他们又如法炮制了同样的计划。

sentences.english: A political conference was held the following year, as provided in the armistice agreement .
sentences.chinese: 按照停战协定的规定，翌年召开了政治会议。

sentences.english: The very next year, Lamy begins production of its own branded fountain pen ink.
sentences.chinese: 翌年，拉米开始了自己的品牌钢笔墨水的生产。

sentences.english: The following year and the fourth cut from the 17th Army Division.
sentences.chinese: 翌年第四军又缩编为第十七师。

definition: just at that time/as it happens/by good luck, just then
first month (of either lunar or Western calendars)
this or that very day/in the next few days
Peiping or Beiping (name of Beijing at different periods, esp. 1928-1949)
to complete a course of study (old)/to graduate
accompanied by one's dependents/encumbered by wife and children
